Uses of Class
application.PDU

    • Uses of PDU in application

      Methods in application that return PDU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PDU PDU_Factory.alive(int id, int nrOfClients)
      Creates alive PDU.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.chnick(java.lang.String nick)
      Creates chnick PDU Client -> Server Used for setting a new nickname.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.chtopic(int id, java.lang.String topic)
      Creates chtopic PDU Server -> DNS Used by the server to inform the DNS of the new topic.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.chtopic(java.lang.String topic)
      Creates a chtopic PDUS Client -> Server Used for changing the topic and informing the other clients.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.getlist()
      Creates getlist PDU client -> DNS Used for requesting a list of active servers by the DNS.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.join(java.lang.String nick)
      Creates join PDU Client -> Server Used for connecting to a server.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.message(int msgType, java.lang.String text, byte[] cryptKey)
      Creates message PDU Client <-> Server Used for transferring a string of text
      static PDU PDU_Factory.nicks(java.lang.String[] strArray)
      Creates nicks PDU Server -> Client
      static PDU PDU_Factory.quit()
      Creates quit PDU Client -> Server Used disconnecting from the server.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.reg(java.net.InetAddress dns_address, int dns_port, java.lang.String topic)
      Creates a register PDU Server -> DNS
      static PDU PDU_Factory.ucnick(java.lang.String nickOld, java.lang.String nickNew, int timeStamp)
      Creates ucnick PDU Server -> Client Used for informing all clients that someone has changed its nickname.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.uinfo(java.net.InetAddress ip, int timestamp)
      Creates uinfo PDU Server -> Client Used for sending information about a specific client.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.ujoin(java.lang.String nick, int timeStamp)
      Creates ujoin PDU Server -> Client Used for informing all Clients that a new Client has connected.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.uleave(java.lang.String nick, int timeStamp)
      Creates uleave PDU Server -> Client Used for informing all connected client that a client has disconnected.
      static PDU PDU_Factory.whois(java.lang.String str)
      Creates whois PDU Client -> Server Used for requesting more information about a specific user.
      Methods in application with parameters of type PDU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean PDU_Factory.checksum(PDU pdu, int index)
      Calculates a new checksum of a PDU and compares it to the existing checksum in the PDU.
      void ToServer.sendPDU(PDU pdu)
      Receives a PDU and sends it through the super class TCP to the server.
      void ToClient.sendPDU(PDU pdu)
      Sends a PDU to the connected client through the class TCP witch is using the TCP protocol.
      void UDP.sendPDU(PDU pdu)
      Sends a PDU through the UDP protocol using datagram packets.
      void Server.sendPDUToAllClients(PDU pdu)
      Sends a PDU to all connected clients of this server.
      void Server.sendPDUToDNS(PDU pdu)
      Sends a PDU to the DNS.
